Here you will find information on the different parts of the app.
In the homepage you can see the data of each book by pressing the title button. You can also edit any evaluation by pressing the pencil button and delete any book by pressing the recycle bin button.
In this section of the app you can add new books to your database.
In this section of the app you can delete any book of your database.
Here you can see all the information of books written by one author. Using the top spinner, select the author and just underneath the app will show you all his/her books.

This section allows you to modify your evaluation of any book. Using the top spinner, select the book and just underneath the app will show you your evaluation on that book. Make the changes you desire and save them by pressing the floppy disk button.
